blog-posts.title: COOL JAZZ VIBES AND COCKTAILS
blog-posts.description: Tuesday night is Jazz & Martini Night at Grand Residences. Join us for great live music and classic martinis, shaken not stirred of course

blog-posts.title: COOL DRINKS, SEAFOOD AND AN UNBEATABLE VIEW, HEAVEN
blog-posts.description: It's a summer afternoon in paradise and the only place to be is by the beach.

blog-posts.title: MELLOW RIVIERA MAYA MASSAGES
blog-posts.description: A relaxing massage is the way to slip into your Riviera Maya summer vacation and there are plenty of options awaiting you at the Spa.

blog-posts.title: COOL COCKTAILS
blog-posts.description: The exotic flavors of mango, fresh ginger and coconut combine with vodka to create a tropical frappé that is perfect for poolside lounging.

blog-posts.title: COOKING CLASS WITH CHEF GUIDO
blog-posts.description: Sign up for a fun cooking class with Chef Guido de la Mora, collect new recipes to try at home and fine-tune your kitchen skills.

gms.title-gms-program: Important information about My Royal Program
gms.gms-program:
New and current subscribers looking to book and stay with us for the first time will be entitled to an extra 10% discount, which is applicable on top of our current offers (Please note that certain restrictions may apply).

For returning travelers subscribed to My Royal and have had previous stays with us with reservations made through our official websites such as royalreservations.com, grandresidences.com, royalresorts.com, or our contact center, we will extend a special repetitive customer benefit of a 10% additional discount.

These exclusive "My Royal" discounts can be accessed and redeemed by logging into the My Royal portal with your registered account while making your reservation.

Please be aware that My Royal additional discounts cannot be combined with each other or with any ongoing promotions or discounts. Moreover, they do not apply to Hotel + Flight packages.

Previous stays made through other online travel agencies other than our official websites or contact center will not be eligible for returning customer discounts.
